predicate.note: Frames file for 'relive' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: But as they hurl fireballs that [*T*-2] smolder rather than burn , and relive old duels in the sun , it [*EXP*-1] 's clear that most are there [*-3] to make their fans cheer again or recapture the camaraderie of seasons past or prove to themselves and their colleagues that they still have it -- or something close to it .
